flawed_nl_solution:
The difference in age between Joel and his dad is 32 - 5 = <<32-5=72>>72 years.
When you double this gap in years, you have 72 x 2 = <<72*2=144>>144.
When his dad is 144, Joel will be 144 / 2 = <<144/2=72>>72 years old.
#### 72

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 27, not 72. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
